name: Vista Los Sueños Adventure Park
description: Located at the north end of Jaco, this place offers zip lining, canopy tour, repelling, atving, horseback riding, waterfalls

name: El Miro
description: This abandoned unfinished mansion is a hike close by with 2 viewing decks that provide panoramic view of Playa Jaco. The first viewing deck is about a 20 minute hike, and then another 25 minutes to the second viewing deck.

name: Manuel Antonio Park Info Center
description: 1 hour south of Jaco, this national park has trails, white sand beaches, and has a lot of wildlife like sloths, monkeys, deer, macaws and iguanas.

name: Los Sueños Resort and Marina
description: A luxury resort and marina offering various activities.

name: Marina Pez Vela
description: A beautiful marina with various restaurants and shops.

name: Nauyaca Waterfalls
description: A stunning waterfall located in the rainforest.

name: Jaco Crocodile tour
description: If you're brave, ride a river boat along Rio Tarcoles to experience the mangroves, birds, and the abundance of crocodiles just 30 minutes north. If you're not brave enough, you can just drive to the bridge over Rio Tarcoles to view the crocodiles right under.

name: Deep Sea Sport Fishing Los Suenos
description: If sport fishing is your thing, you can book a boat for the day to head out and catch Yellowfin Tuna, Mahi, Marlin, Snapper, Rooster fish and Costa Rica's waters have the largest concentration of pacific sailfish.

name: Villa Caletas Hotel
description: A beautiful hotel with stunning ocean views.
